content:
version: 2
services:
  custapp-ui-1.0:
    image: "imineev/custapp-ui:1.0"
    ports:
      - "9200:9100/tcp"
    environment:
      - HOST_IP={{hostip_for_interface .HostIPs "eth0"}}
      - OCCS_PHASE_ID=1
      - "occs:description=Node.js v6.8.0"
  custapp-db-1.0:
    image: "cbras/oracle-ee12102:1.0"
    environment:
      - ORACLE_SID=ORCLCDB
      - ORACLE_PDB=ORCLPDB1
      - ORACLE_TESTDATA=load3.sql
      - ORACLE_TESTDATA_OUT=dataload.out
      - "occs:description=Oracle EE 12102 loaded with custapp:1.0 test data"
      - OCCS_PHASE_ID=0
    ports:
      - "1521:1521/tcp"
      - "5500:5500/tcp"
    volumes:
      - "logslave:/logslave:rw"
    command:  "/logslave/myRunOracle.sh"
